name: Energy Globe Foundation GmbH
goal:
Energy Globe Foundation is a non-profit organization founded by Austrian energy pioneer, Wolfgang Neumann. Building on 30 years of experience in the area of energy efficiency and renewable energies, Energy Globe Foundation is a global leader in the area of sustainability.

The primary objective of Energy Globe Foundation is to create a higher level of awareness all over the world concerning the necessity of using resources in a sustainable manner, especially as far as energy is concerned, and, on the other hand, by planning specific projects aimed at creating a more sustainable future for coming generations and improving living conditions in developing countries.
